title: Bug
alt: The universe started in 1970. Anyone claiming to be over 38 is lying about their age.
transcript:
[Cueball sits at a computer, staring at the screen and rubbing his chin in thought. A friend stands behind him.]
Cueball: Weird â€” My code's crashing when given pre-1970 dates.
Friend [pointing at Cueball and his computer]: Epoch fail!
